Key Match Events: Denmark and Serbia meet to conclude their UEFA EURO 2024 Group C campaigns on Tuesday 25 June.
Both teams need to win to secure a spot in the round of 16.
Denmark drew both of their games so far 1-1, while Serbia have just the one point.
Pre-Game Insights: The countries' previous ten meetings have ended with five wins apiece, but the momentum is with the Danes, who have won their four most recent encounters.
Denmark can also call on greater recent EURO experience.
Post-Match Reflections: The message from coach Hjulmand and his players is clear: they are in Munich to win!
Others: The permutations are complicated, and who finishes third in Group C will also depend on what happens when England meet Slovenia.
